nodes.text: Sssamm Ashsssen was a male Fillithar member of the Apprentice Legislature in 3 BBY. He participated in a pathfinding class organized for members of the Legislature by Queen Breha Organa of Alderaan. Princess Leia Organa noted his participation in the class was unusual, as serpent-like species such as the Fillithar did not usually engage in pathfinding, which was most popular with humanoids.
In Leia Organa: Ordeal of the Princess was depicted as having red scales, when the source material, Leia, Princess of Alderaan described his scales as "iridescent green."
